articles.title: Eargo, Inc. (NASDAQ:EAR) Short Interest Update
articles.description: Eargo, Inc. (NASDAQ:EAR – Get Free Report) was the recipient of a large drop in short interest during the month of November. As of November 15th, there was short interest totalling 127,200 shares, a drop of 60.3% from the October 31st total of 320,200 shares.…
